summary: Provides foundational constants and low‑level GPU‑optimized helper routines required by the Numba‑based Recurrent Neural Network Transducer (RNNT) loss implementation, handling data types, execution parameters, arithmetic, tensor manipulation, and numerically stable operations.
business_intent: Enable fast and memory‑efficient training of speech‑recognition models by supplying high‑performance RNNT loss calculations on CUDA‑capable hardware.
